summary: Meichu Hackathon：Feature phone 求職 App（CloudMosa Track）
擅長：系統拆解、功能落地、團隊協作、清楚的成果描述

projects.name: Job-Finding App for Feature Phones — Meichu Hackathon (CloudMosa Track)
desc: Designed and developed a job-finding application optimized for keypad-based feature phones (Cloud Phones).
Implemented core functionalities including job posting, application workflow, and employer contact system.
Designed an intuitive UI navigation flow tailored for non-touch devices and constrained hardware environments.
Collaborated with a team of four to define system architecture and deliver a functional prototype.

projects.name: Surakarta Chess AI — TCGA Computer Game Competition (Gold Award)
desc: Developed an automated AI agent for the board game Surakarta Chess.
Implemented game logic and AI decision-making to compete against other AI teams.
Achieved Gold Award in a national-level computer game competition.
